comment.author: 76381637@N08
comment._content: I suggest that this picture may be related to the photographs of unidentified soldiers in 4481_a026_691. I think he may be one of the mounted soldiers in that picture. He is wearing the uniform of a New South Wales Military Officer of 1885.

comment.author: 76381637@N08
comment._content: A correction to my previous post. The unidentified soldiers mentioned are in 4482_a026_695 not 691 as I stated. Sorry.
